name: Naught Bots
description:
Developed by solo dev JT Mitchell.

Naught Bots is a single player fps game that takes place inside the hive mind of the oppressively happy Naughty_Bot_Network. You play as a virus bot determined to wipe the smiles off of each and every last Naughty Bots face. Survive wave after wave of unrelenting Naughty Bots as the hive mind changes the level around you.

-Make cute things cry.
-Survive waves of oppressively happy Naughty Bots.
-Dynamic level changes around you.
-Jam out to Synth Rock music by Ghostfeeder.
-Support Solo Dev JT Mitchell (Shameless plug).






Day 1 Patch Notes:
Bots? Where? Were not bots we just want hugs...
...MeRdEr HuGs ^w^

-Added 1 new level change.
-Added 2 new level change variations.
-Added potato mode (trades graphics for higher performance).
-Bots less likely to spawn in pit of death.
-Balancing:
-Player now starts with full health and armor (100% more armor).
-Player can run 25% faster when below 1/3 health.
-Semi Auto Mode:
-> Held down fires faster.
-> Has a short cooldown now.
-> Can no longer be rapid fired. (per playtester feed back this was to OP).
-Full Auto Mode now has shorter cooldown.
-Rapid fire mode now takes slightly longer to overheat.
-Hope you like it!
